file

A file. A record of files managed on the file system.

Attribute Comment Format Attributes
id  The unique key.  id id
pk
 
name  A record of the file's original name. The name on our system is different. This may be initially unknown (null).  text100
max length: 100
allows( printable ) 		 
path  The local path to the file. This is not the full file system path, but rather the relative path based on the root directory that contains persistent files.  text100
max length: 100
allows( printable ) 		required
 
createdUtcTs  The time when the file was created (in our system).  timestamp required
 
statusCode  The status of the file. New: being created, should not use yet. Ready: Available for use; should not not edit. Deleted: The file has been deleted from the file system.  letterCode
max length: 1
allows( letters ) 		required
 
size  The size of the file (in bytes).  integer  
partialSize  This may be used to monitor file creation status. E.g.: for web uploads.  integer  
lockVersion  Used for optimistic locking.  lockVersion  
statusName  ${field.f_comment}  name
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		 
createdLocalTs  ${field.f_comment}  timestamp  
createdLocalTsMessage  ${field.f_comment}  text100
max length: 100
allows( printable ) 		 
createdLocalDate  ${field.f_comment}  date  
createdLocalTime  ${field.f_comment}  time
